Text: Quality on songs that weren't released at the time are horrible. The whole disc 2 sounds like crap as well. Best version is here for disc 1... https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6795227/VA-Now_Thats_What_I_Call_Music_40-%28US_Retail%29-2011-CR
